**Property Description**: Chordwise offset (in attrition to natural offset)
ComponentDef – See :numref:`componentDefTable`. Blade components such as spar, panels, etc…
1 × 2  array. Defines distance between keypoints b & c [mm]. First entry is the HP spar cap. Second entry is the LP spar cap
1: offset by max thickness, 0: do not offset to max thickness
1: CW rotation looking downwind, -1: CCW rotation
0: planar shear webs, 1: shearwebs twisted by blade twist
Approximate element edge size for FE model [m]
